item.title: How to think about C++ variadic templates
item.description: Motivation Variadic templates are weird. They can’t be iterated through with a loop and the recursive approach is odd. Although I personally do dislike how variadic templates are handled in C++, I hope you learn to cognize it at the end of this post. Parameter packs == Lists Parameter packs are similar to lists in Lisp. The recursive approach is identical to how you unwrap a list in lisp. One warning though, you may be Lost In a Sea of Parentheses.

item.title: Why avoid scanf as a beginner
Hello Blogging
item.description: This is my first attempt at “serious” blogging. I mainly just want to practice writing more, and also save some of my thoughts. You can expect some sprinkles of my life, programming topics I find interesting, or just general nerdy stuff :) . Hopefully you find something intersting in the coming blogs.
